question.title: How many #1 seeds will reach the Elite Eight in the NCAA's 2026 March Madness?
question.description:
The [NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NCAA_Division_I_men%27s_basketball_tournament), commonly known as March Madness is an annual single-elimination basketball tournament held in the United States to determine the men's college basketball national champion.

Culminating each yearly season, 68 teams are selected for the championship tournament based on recent performance, with inclusion partly determined by the [NCAA committee](https://www.ncaa.com/news/basketball-men/article/2025-01-16/how-field-68-di-mens-teams-picked-march-madness-each-season). Along with inclusion, the committee also determines bracket assignments, with each team receiving a seed based upon its expected ability.

Due to the format of the tournament beginning with regional brackets, four separate teams each receive the No. 1 bracket seed as the top team in their respective region. In [2025](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_NCAA_Division_I_men%27s_basketball_tournament), all top seeds reached the final 4, however in [2023](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2023_NCAA_Division_I_men%27s_basketball_tournament) none reached the final 8.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":42290,"question_id":42077}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the amount of Number 1 bracket seeds that qualify for the Regional Finals (Round of 8) in the [2026 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament](https://www.ncaa.com/march-madness-live/bracket).
question.fine_print:
If the tournament's format is changed or interrupted, this question will resolve based upon the final eight teams.

If the tournament is cancelled or delayed such that results remain unknown before May 1, 2026, this question will be annulled.

***
This question's information (resolution criteria, fine print, background info, etc) is synced with an [original identical question](https://www.metaculus.com/questions/42290) which opened on 2026-02-25 17:00:00. This question will resolve based on the resolution criteria and fine print contained above. However, if this question would resolve differently than the original question, then this question will be annulled. Additionally, if the original question's resolution could have been known before this question opened, then this question will be annulled.
question.short_title: How many top seeds will reach Elite Eight in 2026 March Madness?
